entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Regina
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -12.8°C

Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 8:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
